original_table_html:
Beverages
Water Flavored
Nonalcoholic Alcoholic
Milk Juices Wine Distilled spirits
Hot beverages Soft drinks Beer
summary_markdown: This table outlines a hierarchical classification of beverages, starting with a broad category of "Beverages" that branches into "Water" and "Flavored" types. The "Flavored" category further divides into "Nonalcoholic" and "Alcoholic" subcategories. Under "Nonalcoholic," specific examples include "Milk," "Juices," "Hot beverages," and "Soft drinks." The "Alcoholic" category encompasses "Wine," "Beer," and "Distilled spirits." This structure presents a comparative breakdown of beverage types based on their primary characteristics and alcohol content.
